Posted By: Hunter06 (11/29/2012 7:39:07 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Shades are not great outside of limited because they're creatures that demand that you commit atrocious amounts of {B} to them for them to be big threats. They don't even have built-in protection or additional mana sink abilities to make them more useful. However, [Stromgald Crusader](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Stromgald Crusader), and [Order of the Ebon Hand](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Order of the Ebon Hand) do. [Stillmoon Cavalier](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Stillmoon Cavalier) does it very successfully.
posts.html:
Shades are not great outside of limited because they're creatures that demand that you commit atrocious amounts of {B} to them for them to be big threats. They don't even have built-in protection or additional mana sink abilities to make them more useful. However, Stromgald Crusader, and Order of the Ebon Hand do. Stillmoon Cavalier does it very successfully.
